EmailTemplate.subject: Tee Up at the Golf Club at Chelsea Piers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On Tuesday, September 28th we’re teeing up with Presidio and your technology peers for an evening of food, drinks, and of course, golf with a view. Whether you are a customer today or still considering becoming a part of the family, we hope you will join us to get to know our community. Reserve your spot today for an evening of fun on us. The Golf Club at Chelsea Piers <[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]>
59 Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011 Thursday, September 28th 5:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/nyc-community-appreciation-chelsea-piers/]]>
Please reach out to megan.gay@turbonomic.com or your account executives for any further questions.
We hope to see you there,
- Your Turbonomic Team
